What features would you like to see in a: As a stay-at-home mom, I would love to see a digital banking service that offers personalized financial management tools to help me manage my family's finances better. Lastly, having access to financial advice from experts would be a huge plus.

What concerns do you have about using a: As a mom, my biggest concern would be the security of my personal and financial information. I would want to make sure that the digital banking service has strong security measures in place to protect my data from cyber threats.
